name: Shauntal
info: While she is one of the Unova Pokémon League’s Elite Four, she is also a novelist who sometimes uses Trainers who challenge her as material for her books.

moves.name: Hex
moves.effect: This move’s power is doubled when the target is affected by a status condition.

moves.name: X Sp. Atk
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Sp. Atk by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Shadow Ball
moves.effect: Has a chance (20%) of lowering the target’s Sp. Def by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: A Tale of Triumph!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by 3 stat ranks. Raises the user’s evasiveness by 2 stat ranks. Leaves the user burned.

syncMove.name: Dark Tales of the Shadow Ball

passives.name: Unhindered
passives.description: When the user attacks, ignores damage-reducing effects on the target’s field of play.

passives.name: Power Reserves 2
passives.description: Powers up the user’s moves when in a pinch.
